channel.title: Starting Message for Player/Mod/Admin/User
channel.description: I'm wondering how to edit the starting message for the players, the mods, the admins, adn the users. Also can som1 tell me how to make text cyan? And wat do i use to say the players name? Like "Welcome "player's name" "

item.title: Starting Message for Player/Mod/Admin/User
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

jus wat i needed to noe cccrrraaazzziii Ty for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Starting Message for Player/Mod/Admin/User
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

[quote="~ownage~, post:2, topic:75368"]to make a text cyan or any colors really i think you follow the normal runescape way which is:
cyan:: [text goes here]. ;D

sincerly,
~ownage~[/quote]

He didn’t ask for that I don’t think.

Firstly. You need to open up client.java and search for something like “has just logged in”, then when you have found it, all the other information will be near by, just edit it. And I don’t actually think you can change the font color in the welcome message. But if you do use it for anything else, the cyan color code is “@cya@”.

Read full topic
